changelog.title: New Character Selection
changelog.description: Added a new character selection screen.

changelog.title: Inventory Crash
changelog.description: Fixed a crash that occurred when opening the inventory.

changelog.title: Fireball Damage
changelog.description: Increased the damage of the fireball spell by 20%.

changelog.title: Main Menu Redesign
changelog.description: Redesigned the main menu for a more modern look.

changelog.title: Quest Completion
changelog.description: Fixed an issue where quest completion was not triggering properly.
